q: '' It was a nice touch by Allen Iverson to seek out Larry Bird Brown, his coach for the past 3 1/2 seasons. For a player often described as selfish and immature, it was a giant step toward superstardom. It's special, and it's a tribute to my coach and my teammates, said Allen Iverson . ''I've always felt that whether these guys know it or not, kids watch them and want to be like them and today was the greatest thing for basketball,'' Brown said. ''

. Kyle Korver was mobbed by his wildly celebrating teammates. Boston Pops players sat dazed on the bench. A third overtime was on deck. urging Mike Pence to run for the presidency is a former deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan and former U.S. Rep. Jim Ryun , R-Kan. Mike Pence said the decision he and his wife will reach will be based on where can we make the most difference for the conservative principles that carried us into public service. It also comes down to where are we needed most. While Mike Pence would be one of numerous Republicans considering presidential campaigns, he would enter a race for governor as the favorite. California Treasurer Bill Lockyer told Reuters Insider Monday that states may not need the same freedom to declare bankruptcy as major companies because they have a guaranteed source of revenue. The major difference, of course, is that we're looking at sovereign governments that have the ability to enact a tax, and that's not the case of these private corporations that may have unfunded obligations that they can't deal with, he said. Within three months, he was appointed David Cameron 's communications director. The deafening silence from political leaders reveals the grip( Rupert) Murdoch's empire has over the establishment, the Guardian said. The Guardian named David Cameron , deputy PM Nick Clegg , finance minister George Osborne and Labour party leader Ed Miliband , as ''schmoozing with Murdoch at summer parties''.
